title: Blended Teaching Method Design to Strengthen Self-Regulated Learning Strategies in Online Learning Communities

context.prior_knowledge: Experience using fundamental digital learning tools and intermediate-level English vocabulary proficiency
context.additional_context: English vocabulary enhancement program for professionals in medical, legal, and technical fields. Provides digital devices (tablets/laptops) and combines twice-weekly face-to-face sessions with asynchronous online activities.

learning_goals: Learners can systematically implement three self-regulated learning strategies—goal setting, time management, and resource utilization—on the OLC platform
Learners evaluate their technology acceptance (perceived usefulness/ease of use) in online learning environments at a satisfaction level exceeding 80%
Through project-based assessment, learners create personalized vocabulary acquisition plans and present execution results as data
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
